name: Good Morning Rain Meadow, Now I Have Chinese Input!
description: 为雨甸添加中文输入支持<LINE>让你可以在雨甸聊天框中输入中文<LINE>特别鸣谢：感谢哈维(Harvie)提供的聊天UI核心代码<LINE>Add Chinese input support for Rain Meadow<LINE>Allows you to input Chinese in Rain Meadow chat box<LINE>Special thanks: Thanks to Harvie for providing the core chat UI code
